title: KAHLIL GIBRAN Boundless Sorrow & Unclouded Joy:
description: The beauty of Kahlil Gibran's thoughts is that they are not filled with any dogmas. They are accessible to everyone, no matter what faith community one belongs to. I hope this little booklet with a selection of some of his most beautiful and inspiring quotes and poems will touch you as much as it has touched me. "God judges a tree by its fruits and not by its roots." ~ Paulo Coelho
author: Kahlil Gibran
